alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 07 at 4:13AM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Grayson County. In North Carolina, Watauga and Ashe Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. Although accumulating snowfall has come to an end, the morning commute will be slick with residual snow on roadways.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory is issued when strong winds will combine with cold temperatures for several hours to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin. Use caution while outside and bring pets inside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
